definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)

pinyin: jing1 dian3 dong4 li4 xi4 tong3

sentences.chinese: 第二，罗克维尔自动动力系统。

sentences.english: At the same time a new supercavitating torpedo power system is described.
sentences.chinese: 同时展望了新型的超空泡鱼雷动力系统。

sentences.english: The powerplant is said to be one of the most advanced in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 其被认为是欧洲最先进的动力系统。

sentences.english: D dissertation is concerned with the dynamics of biquadratic polynomials.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要研究双二次多项式的动力系统。

sentences.english: Helical springs are widely used in dynamic systems and are frequently subjected to vibrational fatigue failure.
sentences.chinese: 螺旋弹簧多用于动力系统且常易发生疲劳破坏。

sentences.english: The drawings reveal Ferrari is working on an all - wheel drive hybrid system.
sentences.chinese: 图纸透露法拉利是工作的全时四轮驱动混合动力系统。

sentences.english: The experiment of Hybrid power rubber tired gantry crane system is divided into two stages.
sentences.chinese: 轮胎式起重机混合动力系统的实验分为两个部分。

sentences.english: A superimposing iteration harmonic balance method (SIHB) is presented for the steady-state analysis of strongly nonlinear oscillators.
sentences.chinese: 提出一类强非线性动力系统的叠加迭代谐波平衡法。

sentences.english: An calculating method for design parameter optimization of the propulsion system of the sounding rocket is given.
sentences.chinese: 提出了探空火箭动力系统设计参数优化计算方法。

sentences.english: He believes that would be like removing the power system of an aircraft.
sentences.chinese: 他认为，这样就像拆掉了飞机的动力系统一样不智。

sentences.english: Two harmonics method is presented for strongly nonlinear dynamic-system.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一类强非线性动力系统的两项谐波法。

sentences.english: Strong technical understanding of commercial vehicles and driveline components.
sentences.chinese: 对商务车辆及动力系统有较强的理解能力。

sentences.english: The state of a dynamical system is dependent on its controllable parameters.
sentences.chinese: 一个动力系统的状态依赖于其中的控制参数。

sentences.english: The essay dis- cusses the dynamical system and optimization measures of the informationization of teaching management.
sentences.chinese: 就教学管理信息化的动力系统和优化措施进行了探讨。

sentences.english: Simulation of aircraft power system involves coupling of multi-physics.
sentences.chinese: 航空发动机动力系统仿真涉及到多学科的耦合研究。

sentences.english: Today's vehicles are designed with emission controls as integral components of the powertrain.
sentences.chinese: 当前汽车的排放控制在设计上是动力系统的一部分。
